description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. SOLAR ANNIHILATION by reddeathgames. Explore a dynamic 2d solar system while completing missions ranging from seek and destroy to stealth and resource gathering. Sandbox elements allow player to go anywhere at anytime. Full game contains 18 mission campaign, instant action mode, and cheat options.
